post.author: Admin
post.title: NRMB Newsletter – October 3, 2016
post.description: CONGRATS TO OUR BAND FOR EARNING BOTH A SUPERIOR RATING (1) AND GRAND CHAMPION OF THE MAUMEE CONTEST
post.content:
CONGRATS TO OUR BAND FOR EARNING BOTH A SUPERIOR RATING (1) AND GRAND CHAMPION OF THE MAUMEE CONTEST! YOUR PERFORMANCE ROCKED THE HOUSE!

If you have not seen the contest show in its entirety, you only have 4 more chances: after football game Oct 7, Copley Oct 15, Brunswick Oct 22 and States…. Do not miss out on this fantastic contest show: The Elements.

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com (see below)

DATES you need to know:

  • OCT 7 – SENIOR BAND NIGHT -- see below!
  • Oct 7 – Football game – HOME Brecksville/Broadview Hts --- HOMECOMING!
  • Oct 14 – Football game – AWAY Nordonia
  • Oct 15 – Fruit sale order forms are due
  • OCT 15 – CONTEST – COPLEY
  • Oct 21 – Football game AWAY Cuyahoga Falls
  • OCT 22 – CONTEST – BRUNSWICK
  • OCT 24 – BAND BOOSTER MEETING -- 7PM MEDIA CENTER

Senior Band Night

Senior Band night is OCTOBER 7. Hospitality is still MISSING many RSVP forms from Seniors. We need to place the order for food, flowers and reserved seating tickets by Monday. If you have not turned in your information, CONTACT: Helen Kelly: alandhelenkelly@cox.net IMMEDIATELY!

Senior Band Night Volunteers Still Needed

We are still in need of volunteers for the following areas on Senior Band Night:

  • 50/50: Contact: Elisa Race -- 216-407-5625
  • Uniforms: Contact: Anthony Amato -- 216-401-7763
  • Hospitality: Contact Helen Kelly -- 440-746-9048

Fruit Sale --- Keep Selling Fruit! We would love to sell a TRUCKload

The Marching Band Fruit Sale is officially underway If you need extra forms, they are in the band room. Forms are due back to the White Band box by October 15th!

Other Fundraisers:

GFS: If you shop at GFS, remember to mention: North Royalton Band Boosters and Marching Band at checkout. We have an account there and accumulate $$$$ for everything YOU spend!

Smile.Amazon Are you an Amazon shopper? Set up a SMILE.AMAZON account and a percentage of what you purchase will be added to the North Royalton Band Booster account:

YOU can help North Royalton High School Band Boosters when you shop for back-to-school supplies and many other items that you purchase from Amazon! This link will help you set up your SMILE account!.

Support us when you shop for back-to-school items. #StartWithaSmile at http://smile.amazon.com/ch/34-1817202 and Amazon donates.
